# ARGeometryPrimitiveType.line

**Case**

A line segment in which a line connects two vertices.

## Declaration

```swift
case line
```

## Type of Connection

- **ARGeometryPrimitiveType.triangle**: Three vertices that connect to form a triangle.

items.description: Three vertices that connect to form a triangle.
